description: Erythema Ab Igne is a skin condition characterized by a reticulated, erythematous, and hyperpigmented rash that develops from chronic exposure to heat or infrared radiation.
possible causes: Prolonged exposure to heat sources like heating pads, laptops, or hot water bottles
Frequent use of infrared lamps or heaters
symptoms: Mottled or net-like pattern on the skin
Red or brown patches on the affected area
treatments: Moisturizing creams to improve skin texture
